Package model

Class WordleGame

java.lang.Object
model.WordleGame
public class WordleGame extends Object
Coordinates a game of wordle, keeping track of guesses, accounts, and whether or not the game is over.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    WordleGame()
    Gets a random five letter word from WordList.txt and creates board as a new WordleBoard using that random word.
    WordleGame(String word)
    Creates a board as a new WordleBoard using the specified word as the string to find

  • Constructor Details

    • WordleGame

      public WordleGame() throws FileNotFoundException
      Gets a random five letter word from WordList.txt and creates board as a new WordleBoard using that random word.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException

    • WordleGame

      public WordleGame(String word)
      Creates a board as a new WordleBoard using the specified word as the string to find
      Parameters:
      word - - The word to be used as the specific word to be found

  • Method Details

    • guessWord

      public String[] guessWord(String guess)
      Guesses a specific word
      Parameters:
      guess - - Word to be guessed

    • login

      public boolean login(String username, String password)
      Given a two strings, a username and a password, determines if the user exists and if the correct password has been entered for the corresponding username. If both are valid, curUser is set as the given user's WordleAccount
      Parameters:
      username - - the String entered as the user's username
      password - - the String entered as the user's password
      Returns:
      - true if the username and password have been successfully entered false otherwise

    • setCurUser

      public void setCurUser(String username)

    • logout

      public void logout()
      Sets the current user to null so that no WordleAccount is logged in (set as curUser)

    • createAccount

      public boolean createAccount(String username, String password)
      Creates an account given a username and password
      Parameters:
      username - - The intended username for the account to be created
      password - - The intended password for the account to be created
      Returns:
      - True if the intended username is avaliable, false if it is not

    • createAccount

      public boolean createAccount(WordleAccount account)
      Adds a given account to the game
      Parameters:
      account - - the account to be added
      Returns:
      a boolean, whether or not the account can be added.

    • isOver

      public boolean isOver()
      Returns whether the game is over or not
      Returns:
      - true if game is over (Win state has been reached or max guesses have been used), false if game is still going

    • won

      public boolean won()
      Returns whether the game is won or not
      Returns:
      - true if the game has been won (the user has guessed the correct word), false if the user has failed to guess the correct word.

    • getCorrectWord

      public String getCorrectWord()
      Returns the word to be guessed
      Returns:
      - a String, the correct word for this game.

    • getNumGuesses

      public int getNumGuesses()
      Returns the amount of guesses that have been made in the current game
      Returns:
      an int, the number of guesses

    • getCurUser

      public WordleAccount getCurUser()
      Returns the WordleAccount of the current user
      Returns:
      - the WordleAccount of the current user, void if no user is logged in

    • getAccountList

      public ArrayList<WordleAccount> getAccountList()
      Returns the list of accounts in the game
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of all the accounts

    • saveAccounts

      public void saveAccounts()
      Writes the list of accounts to a .ser file

    • loadAccounts

      public void loadAccounts()
      reads the list of accounts from a .ser file and loads them into the game.
